content.rendered:
GEOKC Selfless Services Form

Bhakti is loyalty, surrender, faithfulness attachment and devotion and in spiritual term
bhakti is intense spiritual love and devotion to God. All services included in this form are
selfless and services to God. Anyone can join the Selfless Services of GEOKC.

Contact Information


Selfless Services Areas

You can also see the Selfless Service link in the website of GEOKC for detail information. After you completed this form then please return via mail or in-person to Selfless Services coordinator to complete the application process:

Global Expansion of Krishna Community
711 West Lake Street
Studio # 605
Minneapolis, MN 55408
612-332-2413
geokcsunita@gmail.com

Thank You!
